title: List of Douglas DC-3 family variants
text:
This is a list of variants of the Douglas DC-3 family of airliner and transport aircraft.
Production totals.
"Data from:
Conversions.
From the early 1950s, some DC-3s were modified to use <a href="Rolls-Royce%20Dart">Rolls-Royce Dart</a> engines, as in the <a href="Conroy%20Turbo%20Three">Conroy Turbo Three</a>. Other conversions featured <a href="Armstrong%20Siddeley%20Mamba">Armstrong Siddeley Mamba</a> or <a href="Pratt%20%26amp%3B%20Whitney%20Canada%20PT6A">Pratt & Whitney Canada PT6A</a> <a href="turboprop">turbines</a>. Recently a Canadian company has also offered a conversion to <a href="PZL%20Asz-62IT">PZL Asz-62IT</a> power.
